thickness.0-0.3: In Art Deco Luxury style, this reflects very subtle surface texture with minimal grain presence.
thickness.0.4-0.7: In Art Deco Luxury style, this reflects a moderate amount of natural grain that adds gentle visual interest.
thickness.0.8-1: In Art Deco Luxury style, this reflects pronounced and expressive grain patterns that stand out.

coarseness.0-0.3: In Art Deco Luxury style, this reflects smooth, polished surfaces with a refined finish.
coarseness.0.4-0.7: In Art Deco Luxury style, this reflects a balance of smoothness with slight natural roughness.
coarseness.0.8-1: In Art Deco Luxury style, this reflects raw, tactile surfaces with visible natural texture.

wiggleness.0-0.3: In Art Deco Luxury style, this reflects uniform, controlled material appearance with minimal natural variation.
wiggleness.0.4-0.7: In Art Deco Luxury style, this reflects a gentle amount of natural irregularity blended into the material.
wiggleness.0.8-1: In Art Deco Luxury style, this reflects strong natural organic variation and irregularity.

bumpiness.0-0.3: In Art Deco Luxury style, this reflects very minimal décor and clean, unobstructed surfaces.
bumpiness.0.4-0.7: In Art Deco Luxury style, this reflects a curated amount of décor and accessories.
bumpiness.0.8-1: In Art Deco Luxury style, this reflects rich decorative layering with noticeable visual activity.

rigidity.0-0.3: In Art Deco Luxury style, this reflects a casual, loosely organized spatial arrangement.
rigidity.0.4-0.7: In Art Deco Luxury style, this reflects a softly ordered arrangement with balanced placement.
rigidity.0.8-1: In Art Deco Luxury style, this reflects a highly structured and disciplined layout.

symmetry.0-0.3: In Art Deco Luxury style, this reflects asymmetrical composition with natural visual balance.
symmetry.0.4-0.7: In Art Deco Luxury style, this reflects soft balance without strict mirroring.
symmetry.0.8-1: In Art Deco Luxury style, this reflects clean and pronounced symmetrical alignment.

tone.0-0.3: In Art Deco Luxury style, this reflects a warm palette with earthy beiges, sands, and soft warm neutrals.
tone.0.4-0.7: In Art Deco Luxury style, this reflects a balanced palette without strong warm or cool bias.
tone.0.8-1: In Art Deco Luxury style, this reflects a cool palette with pale stone, gray, and blue-gray undertones.

saturation.0-0.3: In Art Deco Luxury style, this reflects very muted, desaturated color tones.
saturation.0.4-0.7: In Art Deco Luxury style, this reflects moderately soft natural hues.
saturation.0.8-1: In Art Deco Luxury style, this reflects richer yet still harmonious color intensity.

brightness.0-0.3: In Art Deco Luxury style, this reflects low-brightness, soft and shadowed color values.
brightness.0.4-0.7: In Art Deco Luxury style, this reflects balanced mid-level brightness creating a calm atmosphere.
brightness.0.8-1: In Art Deco Luxury style, this reflects bright, light-reflective color tones.

uniform.0-0.3: In Art Deco Luxury style, this reflects a uniform, monochromatic color palette.
uniform.0.4-0.7: In Art Deco Luxury style, this reflects soft tonal layering with gentle, harmonious variation.
uniform.0.8-1: In Art Deco Luxury style, this reflects more diverse hues with natural blended transitions.
